all_findings.title: Missing Security Header: Strict-Transport-Security
all_findings.description: HSTS - Forces HTTPS connections
all_findings.remediation: Add 'Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains' header

all_findings.title: Missing Security Header: Referrer-Policy
all_findings.description: Controls referrer information sent with requests
all_findings.remediation: Add 'Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin' or more restrictive

all_findings.title: Missing Security Header: Permissions-Policy
all_findings.description: Controls browser features and APIs
all_findings.remediation: Add Permissions-Policy header to restrict unnecessary browser features

all_findings.title: Information Disclosure: server
all_findings.description: Server version disclosure
all_findings.remediation: Remove or obfuscate the 'server' header

all_findings.title: Endpoint Accessible Without Authentication
all_findings.description: API endpoint returns data without requiring authentication
all_findings.remediation: Implement authentication for this endpoint

all_findings.title: No Rate Limiting Detected
all_findings.description: Endpoint accepted 20 requests without rate limiting
all_findings.remediation: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse and DoS attacks

all_findings.description: HTTP CONNECT method is enabled on this endpoint
all_findings.evidence: Allowed methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS, HEAD, CONNECT
all_findings.remediation: Disable CONNECT method if not required
